mapper.sql: shop_product_sku_id, shop_id, shop_product_id, sku_id, name, introduction, sale_price, created_at, updated_at, enabled
mapper.insert: insert into shop_product_sku (shop_product_sku_id, shop_id, shop_product_id, sku_id, name, introduction, sale_price, created_at, updated_at, enabled, coverpic) values (#{shopProductSkuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{shopId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{shopProductId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{skuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{coverpic,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update shop_product_sku
shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
shop_product_id = #{shopProductId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
sku_id = #{skuId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
introduction = #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sale_price = #{salePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT},
coverpic = #{coverpic,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where shop_product_sku_id = #{shopProductSkuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update shop_product_sku set shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, shop_product_id = #{shopProductId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sku_id = #{skuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, introduction = #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sale_price = #{salePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, coverpic = #{coverpic,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where shop_product_sku_id = #{shopProductSkuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update shop_product_sku set shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, shop_product_id = #{shopProductId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sku_id = #{skuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, introduction = #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sale_price = #{salePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT} where shop_product_sku_id = #{shopProductSkuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select sku.sku_id,sku.sku_code,sps.shop_product_id,sku.product_id,sps.shop_product_sku_id ,t_sp.`name`,t_pspk.`name`,t_pspk.product_sku_property_key_id,t_pspv.`value`,t_ss.store from sku inner JOIN shop_product_sku sps on (sps.sku_id = sku.sku_id and sps.enabled = 1) left join sku_property t_sp on (sku.sku_id = t_sp.sku_id and t_sp.enabled = 1) left join product_sku_property_key t_pspk on (t_pspk.product_sku_property_key_id = t_sp.product_sku_property_key_id and t_pspk.enabled = 1 and t_pspk.`name` = 'Size') inner join product_sku_property_value t_pspv on (t_pspv.product_sku_property_value_id = t_sp.product_sku_property_value_id and t_pspv.enabled = 1) left join sku_store t_ss on (sku.sku_id = t_ss.sku_id and t_ss.enabled = 1) where sku.enabled = 1 and sps.shop_product_id = #{shopProductId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select sku.sku_id,sku.sku_code,sps.shop_product_id,sku.product_id,sps.shop_product_sku_id ,t_sp.`name`,t_pspk.`name`,t_pspk.product_sku_property_key_id,t_pspv.`value`,t_ss.store from sku inner JOIN shop_product_sku sps on (sps.sku_id = sku.sku_id and sps.enabled = 1) left join sku_property t_sp on (sku.sku_id = t_sp.sku_id and t_sp.enabled = 1) left join product_sku_property_key t_pspk on (t_pspk.product_sku_property_key_id = t_sp.product_sku_property_key_id and t_pspk.enabled = 1 and t_pspk.`name` = 'Size') inner join product_sku_property_value t_pspv on (t_pspv.product_sku_property_value_id = t_sp.product_sku_property_value_id and t_pspv.enabled = 1) left join sku_store t_ss on (sku.sku_id = t_ss.sku_id and t_ss.enabled = 1) where sku.enabled = 1 and sku.sku_id= #{skuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
